channel.title: My all in one Rc alter

item.title: My all in one Rc alter
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

HI guys i am making an alter that gives 20 of each runes and deletes all the pure ess in inv. But when I click the alter and it dosnt delete the ess but gives me runes if there is room in my invtory. Can someone fix my code so if you have a full invintory of pure ess it deletes it and gives me 20 of each rune. Ty IM AM ON A 517 CODEUSA

case 2484: //All runes alter if (p.skillLvl[20] >= 70) { if (Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 7936) < 28) { Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 7936, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, itemID), itemAmount); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 554, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 556, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 557, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 558, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 559, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 560, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 561, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 562, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 563, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 564, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 565, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 566, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 555, 20); p.skillXP[20] += 10000; p.skillLvl[20] = p.getLevelForXP(20); p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, 20); p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; } else { p.message("You need at least 70 Runecrafting"); } }

Read full topic
